 CAREER OVERVIEW

achieved knowledge in Erection and Execution of EPC project in efficient manner keeping eye 
on technical and commercial ethics with execution as per site condition.

 POSITION                   :  piping engineer
 
      COMPANY                     :  KHARAFI   NATIONAL  KSC (Closed).
                                                   (1/03/2016 to 10/11/2017)
PROJECT                   :   CFP-KNPC (CLEAN FUEL PROJECT/1802)CLIENT                     :  GS E&C (JGSK Joint Venture) –
                                                            KUWAIT   NATIONA   PETROLIUM   CORPORATION 
POSITION                :  piping Supervisor
      COMPANY                    :  KHARAFI   NATIONAL  KSC (Closed).
                                                 (17/06/2014 to 28/02/2016)
PROJECT                  :   BS _171 (New Booster Station)
CLIENT                     :  Saipan   Engineering ( KUWAIT OIL COMPANY)
POSITION                 : Piping   Supervisor
            Job Responsibilities    :
To study of P&ID, GA Drawing, Isometric Drawing received from the Consultant. 
Preparation of Isometric Drawing based on P&ID and GA Drawing for Compressed air 
Line, HSD, a Lube Oil and LDO line, Steam Line, Hot water Line, Process water Line, 
Condensed Recovery Line, R.O Line and Boiler feed water Line etc. 
Pipe Rack and Tank Farm Design with Layout Preparation along with Material Take Off 
(MTO). 
Review of Vendors drawing for all Piping Items as well as other discipline drawing like 
Pumps, Compressor, Heat Exchangers, Oil heaters and Packaged Equipment’s etc.
Inter Departmental Co-ordination with all Disciplines for input / output Requirements. 
Coordinate with Purchase dept. for ensuring the delivery of material at site as per final 
MTO.  
Discuss with Client as well as with Project Management Consultant & Vendors about the 
technical issues in the project. 
Participate in Constructability review with other disciplines and client and attend 3D 
Model Review (30%, 60% and 90%) with the client at various stages of the Project. 
Preparation of AS Built Drawing and make it Approved from consultant as per Site 
Modification.
                  WORK EXPERIENCE (INDIA)      :03 YEARS 
             Company                   : Hindustan HCC Construction Co.Ltd
              Project                       : HALDIYA refinery Ltd Kolkata west Bengal
              Period                        : 10 June 2011 to 30June2012
              P0sstion                     : piping engineer
              Company                  : PUNJ LLOYD LTD.
              Project                        : Reliance industrial Ltd, Motikhavdi   Jamnagar Gujrat,
              Period                         : 15 July 2012 to 25 march 2014
              P0sstion                      : piping engineer                                              
 
     
         Job Responsibilities     
 
Study and understand P & ID, GAD, Line List, Instruments Hook UP and Construction 
Isometric to get the Battery Limits (Scope of Work). 
Over all supervision of site works as per safety guide lines and in according with the 
ASME guide line to achieve targets for execution of project.
Planning and Scheduling of work received from Manager in M.S project and assigned it 
to the supervisors and involved in daily basis progress of piping works at site and closely 
monitoring works for smooth running of project.  Supervise all Fabrication , installation 
and commissioning of CS and SS Pipe with hydro Testing and pneumatic testing as per 
ASME 31.3
Ensure Pipe supports, Hanger Supports, Anchor Supports and Guide supports have been 
installed in accordance with Received AFC isometric Drawing and Pipe Supprt 
Drawings. 
Supervise and inspection of Cold and Hot Line Insulation, Cladding on Pipes and  
Equipments as per Drawings and safety guide lines. 
Checked all Pipes, Fittings, Valves, Supports and Special Parts are as per Tender 
Documents and as per drawings.  Prepare MRN Required at site as per Site Modification 
and make Comparison Sheet for Tender and Non Tender Items that are Used in Projects 
and gets approval from Clients before installation.
Installation, Commissioning and Testing of offsite Facilities as per Statutory Bodies 
Guide Lines. 
Discuss the Criticality of Project with Team Members and Consult with Consultant and 
Client regarding Complexities of the Project.
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Bachelor of Technology (B. Tech) in Mechanical Engineering from  Nizam Institute of 
Engineering and   Technology, Affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Tech nical University 
Hyderabad (J.N.T.U.H).  May 2011.
.
